description: This file defines a Flutter widget called BookCard that displays a book cover, optional ribbon, title, author, rating, price, and a wishlist icon. It manages layout and interactions for a book item in a mobile app.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a book cover, ribbon, title, author, rating, and price, with interactive elements like wishlist and CTA button.

methods.name: _formatPrice
methods.description: Formats an integer price in cents to a currency string in Indian Rupees format.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BookCard, showing cover image, ribbons, title, author, rating, and price, with interactive elements.
